class_b_03_math_01: Hello, everyone. Let’s have a fun class today.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_02:
Tell me, do you all enjoy fortune telling,
horoscopes, and the like?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_03:
I think it feels great to read your horoscope and
see that it says good luck is coming your way.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_04:
So today, I’d like to teach you all math while
focusing on the topic of luck![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_05:
Perhaps you have seen the following phrase
crop up during Pokémon battles before...\c
“A critical hit!”[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_06:
When a Pokémon’s attack lands as a critical hit,
the damage it deals is increased by half.\c
In other words, it does one-and-a-half times as
much damage as it normally would![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_07:
It is truly luck that determines whether your
Pokémon lands a critical hit—or has one landed\r
on it. This can cause a great upset in battle.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_08:
Does anyone know what percent chance a
Pokémon has of landing a critical hit?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_answer_01:
Oh, my. Critical hits land a little more often than
that, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_answer_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]That is correct! Well done,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_answer_03:
Oh, my. That might cause a bit TOO critical of a
situation, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_09:
The chance of landing a critical hit is said to be
1 in 24...which figures to roughly 4.17 percent.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_10:
The odds are more favorable for certain moves,
though—why, moves such as Stone Edge and\r
Shadow Claw have about a 12 percent chance![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_11:
You can also use a move called Focus Energy or
an item known as a Dire Hit.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_12:
Both raise the critical-hit ratio by two stages—
that’s a 50 percent chance to land a critical hit![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_13:
It feels great to land a critical hit, but perhaps
not so great to be struck by one![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_14:
There is a surprising amount of mathematical
probability hidden in Pokémon battles, you know.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_15:
If you’re able to do the calculations that’ll swing
luck in your favor, it may open the door for more\r
strategic choices for you during battle.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_16:
Oh, my. Is that the bell? I suppose that’s all for
now. What a shame...[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_03_math_17:
Next class will be our fun midterm exam! I hope
you’ll all be looking forward to it.[VAR 0114(0025)]
